details.name: Redefine board type (List of boards here)
Redefine memory partitions (ESP32-xx only, WLED >= 0.15.x & MoonMod)

settings.name: Enable WiFi fix for boards like Lolin C3 mini
Enable DMX support (hardware: MAX485 on TX Pin needed, ATTENTION: Does not compile/work togeter with AudioRective WLED, use AR disable option if required)
Define the watchdog tiemout in milliseconds (default: 0 (deactivated))

usermods.name: Remove Audio Reactive Usermod if included per default in Version 0.15.x

envtextfield:
[env:custom_build]
extends = env:esp32s3_4M_qspi
board = lolin_s3_mini ;; -S3 mini, 4MB flash 2MB PSRAM
board_build.flash_mode = qio
board_build.f_flash = 80000000L
board_upload.flash_size = 4MB
board_build.mcu = esp32s3
board_build.f_cpu = 240000000L
board_build.partitions = ${esp32.default_partitions}
build_flags = ${env:esp32s3_4M_qspi.build_flags} -D LOLIN_WIFI_FIX -D WLED_ENABLE_DMX -D WLED_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT=0
custom_usermods =  audioreactive
